mdRecord.dcterms:title: 1926 Floyd Girls Basketball Team
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The 1925 girls basketball team, taken on the steps of the school house, now "School House Fabrics." The people in the photograph are as follows: Row 1: Catherine Morgan, India DeHart Row 2: Edna Robertson, Vera Sumpter, ?, Dorothy Epperly, Mildred Robinson Row 3: Veda Hall, Bill Cox, Mary Watkins, Lillian DeHart, Ruth See, Zeda Mangrum
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Basketball players
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
